about_the_game:
Moonport is a side-scrolling, real time strategy, space colony simulation with roguelike elements. You play as a brave space explorer who aspires to colonize the moons of Saturn. How many moons can you conquer?

    Explore strange moons.
    Expand your base.
    Exploit the resources.
    Exterminate the hostile natives.


Key Features


Earn many unique items which change your strategy.
Fight through hordes of different enemies and bosses.
Discover 10 moons with different enemies, resources, and strategies needed to defeat.
Unlock new items to keep the game fresh with each playthrough.
Save your best highscores.
detailed_description:
Moonport is a side-scrolling, real time strategy, space colony simulation with roguelike elements. You play as a brave space explorer who aspires to colonize the moons of Saturn. How many moons can you conquer?

    Explore strange moons.
    Expand your base.
    Exploit the resources.
    Exterminate the hostile natives.


Key Features


Earn many unique items which change your strategy.
Fight through hordes of different enemies and bosses.
Discover 10 moons with different enemies, resources, and strategies needed to defeat.
Unlock new items to keep the game fresh with each playthrough.
Save your best highscores.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14.2
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Moonport

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 7th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Series 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 7th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Series 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
